messages.authorDescription: Python and Golang software engineer. Expert in agile methodologies and DevOps practices. Fan of the infrastructure as code. Preacher of Cloud computing. React and Gatsby developer as a hobby.
messages.education.0.name: Computer engineering
messages.education.1.name: High school
messages.jobs.0.description: Development of an Ethereum and EVM-compatible blockchains wallet (Typescript and React) focused on privacy. Development of microservices in Golang with Redis. Maintenance and creation of the infrastructure in AWS using Terraform. Monitoring of services on kubernetes using Grafana, Prometheus and Alertmanager. Infrastructure management using Terraform, GtiHub Actions and Flux.
messages.jobs.1.description: Working with students to help them understand key concepts about Python and Django framework. Providing students positive and constructive feedback.
messages.jobs.2.description: Development of microservices in Golang with critical response times using Redis and PostgreSQL. Development of services in Python to serve a machine learning model and notebooks in Databricks. ETL development using Python, Airflow, and Databricks. Maintenance and creation of the infrastructure in AWS using Terraform. Monitoring of services using Datadog, Jaeger and OpsGenie. Infrastructure management using Terraform, GitLab CI/CD, Flux on AWS Kubernetes.
messages.jobs.4.description: Deploy and update applications within our systems foundation (compute, storage, network, etc.). Build monitoring automation and tooling to prove and maintain a world-class end-user experience. Debug and solve complex problems that may span the full service stack. Proactively monitor and manage the availability of infrastructure and applications. Optimize performance of components across the full service. Work closely with product-engineering teams to eliminate technical debt.
messages.jobs.5.description: Web applications (React) and microservices (Python) development. Automation of the deployment, configuration and maintenance of L2 / L3 networks (Cisco and Juniper). Create, implement and maintain a container strategy using OpenShift through pipelines. Maintain tools and technologies used in DevOps processes for continuous delivery and automation deployment. Development of Ansible playbooks and Python scripts to automate processes. Infrastructure migration to Azure Cloud.
messages.jobs.6.description: Creation of vulnerability tests, risk analysis and security assessments. Investigation of security standards and security systems. Definition, implementation and maintenance of RSA Archer GRC.
messages.jobs.7.description: Monitoring with OSSIM. Virtualization (Xen). System administration (Debian).
messages.jobs.9.description: Develop desktop applications (Visual Basic .NET). IT support.
messages.whatsappMessage: Hello Leandro. I've just seen your CV on your website.
